roleset.name: coat with candy shell
roleset.note: CANDY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'candy' based on instances in ectb2, comparison with 'glaze'. No verbnet entry. (from candy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: descriptive
example.text: After dinner there were further treats *0* * to pick up *T* along the way, such as candied jujubes and sauce-stewed chicken and duck, as well as cold drinks such as ginger and honey cordial.
